casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenrick J. BATTLE 144P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 8, 2017 William D. Spence, Attorney at Law, Kinston, for Battle, Kenrick J. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of May 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of May 2017."
